Class IsotopePatternSimilarity

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openscience.cdk.formula.IsotopePatternSimilarity

  • @TestClass(value="org.openscience.cdk.formula.IsotopePatternSimilarityTest")
public class IsotopePatternSimilarity
extends Object
    This class gives a score hit of similarity between two different isotope abundance pattern.

    Miguel Rojas Cherto
